bill.title: An original concurrent resolution setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2025 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2026 through 2034.
bill.description: An original concurrent resolution setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2025 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2026 through 2034.

history.action: Committee on the Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Graham. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 13.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 58. (CR S1006)
Measure laid before Senate by motion.
Considered by Senate. (consideration: CR S1015-1019)
